pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ vassikasāṭikā anuññātā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.7: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.8: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū paṭikacceva vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesissanti, paṭikacceva katvā nivāsessanti, jiṇṇāya vassikasāṭikāya naggā kāyaṃ ovassāpessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.9: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.10: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, paṭikacceva vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesatha?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.15: kathañhi nāma tumhe moghapurisā, paṭikacceva vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesissatha, paṭikacceva katvā nivāsessatha, jiṇṇāya vassikasāṭikāya naggā kāyaṃ ovassāpessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.17: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.18: “‘Māso seso gimhānan’ti bhikkhunā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ; ‘addhamāso seso gimhānan’ti katvā nivāsetabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.19: ‘Orena ce māso seso gimhānan’ti vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyeseyya, ‘orenaddhamāso seso gimhānan’ti katvā nivāseyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.2: Ye manussā pubbepi vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ denti te upasaṅkamitvā evamassu vacanīyā— “kālo vassikasāṭikāya, samayo vassikasāṭikāya, aññepi manussā vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ dentī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.3: Na vattabbā— “detha me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ, āharatha me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ, parivattetha me vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ, cetāpetha me vassikasāṭikacīvaran”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.7: atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.9: atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne katvā nivāseti, nissaggiyaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.10: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.13: “idaṃ me, bhante, vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ atirekamāse sese gimhāne pariyiṭṭhaṃ atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne katvā paridahitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.18: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne atirekasaññī vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.19: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne vematiko vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.20: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne ūnakasaññī vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesati, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.21: Atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne atirekasaññī katvā nivāseti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.22: Atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne vematiko katvā nivāseti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.23: Atirekaddhamāse sese gimhāne ūnakasaññī katvā nivāseti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.24: Satiyā vassikasāṭikāya naggo kāyaṃ ovassāpeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.25: Ūnakamāse sese gimhāne atirekasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.26: Ūnakamāse sese gimhāne vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.28: Ūnakaddhamāse sese gimhāne atirekasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.29: Ūnakaddhamāse sese gimhāne vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.37: nivatthāya vassikasāṭikāya vassaṃ ukkaḍḍhiyyati, dhovitvā nikkhipitabbaṃ; samaye nivāsetabbaṃ,
